name: User Authentication Flow
description: Complete user authentication workflow including login, logout, and password reset functionality
requirements: User can log in with valid email and password
User can log out successfully and be redirected to login page
User can reset password using valid email address
Invalid login credentials show appropriate error messages
Password reset email is sent for valid email addresses
User session persists across page refreshes when logged in
User is redirected to login page when accessing protected routes while logged out
